def main():
    a = int(input())
    result = 1
    while a != 1:
        result += 1
        a = a // 2
    print(result)

main()

import math

def first_solution(input):
    square_root = math.sqrt(input)
    return math.ceil(square_root)

def second_solution(input):
    return math.ceil(math.sqrt(input))

# Test & Result


def test(input, result):
    print(input, result)
    assert(input == result)


test(first_solution(2), 1)
test(first_solution(4), 2)
test(first_solution(27), 5)
test(first_solution(42), 6)

test(second_solution(2), 1)
test(second_solution(4), 2)
test(second_solution(27), 5)
test(second_solution(42), 6)
